org.gearvrf

Class GVRAndroidResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRAndroidResource

  • public class GVRAndroidResource
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to minimize overload fan-out. APIs that load resources can take a GVRAndroidResource instead of having overloads for assets files, res/drawable and res/raw files, and plain old files. See the discussion of asset-relative filenames vs. R.raw resource ids in the package description.
    Since:
    1.6.1

        java.io.IOException

      • setStream

        protected void setStream(java.io.InputStream s)
        Sets the stream for a resource. This function allows you to provide a stream that is already open to an existing resource. It will throw an exception if that resource already has an open stream.
        Parameters:
        s - InputStream currently open stream to use for I/O.

      • closeStream

        Close the open stream. Close the stream if it was opened before
